name: White Sands Negril

reviews.title: Great people, place and value
reviews.text: My friend and I were at White Sands May 2002. We had such a great time. Management was very professional and the staff was kind and sweet to us. Everybody there definitely made our 10 days in Negril very comfortable and interesting. The beach there is just amazing! If you want to experience the true Negril and if you don't want to spend all you money on were you sleep...choose White Sands!

reviews.title: White Sands - Thanks from the English girls.
reviews.text: Having just returned from our first trip to Jamaica for a birthday celebration, we have only praise for White Sands. The location, the accommodation and especially the staff were truely amazing. We were taken care of from start to finish, from Patrick collecting us from MoBay, Henry (the best guy around), nothing was ever a problem, Kay and the other housekeepers who cooked an amazing birthday dinner and kept the place clean and homely and Paul and Tony who made the most amazing cocktails, dangerous as they were!! Francis thanks for making our trip run smoothly. The family owned White Sands was the best place to spend a birthday celebration. 6 of us stayed in the 4 roomed villa which was better than the internet could show. We were made to feel at home and could not have asked for any more. White Sands was safe and secure and has guarantteed we will return. Having spent 10 days there we can understand why many people return year after year. See you again soon! Helen and Polly.

reviews.title: Home away from home.
reviews.text: Home away from home is the only way to describe White Sands. This was my 2nd time at White Sands and all I can say is the service and quality is impeccable. You will not be disappointed with your stay at White Sands. The rooms are clean, housekeeping is friendly and trustworthy and the owners treat you like family. This is no doubt one of the best places to stay in Negril.

reviews.title: Mistreated at the White Sands
reviews.text: After entering the property for the first time, I noticed a couple of men walking around, who obviously didn't belong there. This made us a little nervous, but we dismissed it as paranoia. As we unpacked our things, we noticed a layer of soot on the entire floor (This is a small complaint compared to what was about to happen next). While disrobing in the bathroom on the first day, my wife was boldly violated by a peeping tom who had the audacity to try to proposition her at the same time. He slipped into the night before I could wrap my fingers around his neck. We decided to stay anyway, which was really a mistake, in retrospect (We booked the remaining nights at Rockhouse, after the incident, which later gave us the secure feeling we needed). The next day (unbelievably), while the maid sincerely expressed anguish and empathy, one of the owners there never even once apologized, nor made any apologetic gesture or remark. I was completely amazed by this. On a positive note, it was a small, but nice room for the price, and is well-situated on the beach. Perhaps security will be beefed-up once high season begins....

reviews.title: 12 Days at White Sands
reviews.text: I stayed at White Sands this past July for 12 days with my two young kids. This was my third trip to Negril; the first for the kids. We had an excellent vacation and our stay at White Sands was certainly one of the highlights. We stayed in a one-bedroom apartment (#2), which worked out well for us. I loved having the kitchen/dining room available. Although we did eat out often, we did have many meals in. Some of the meals I prepared and others I had prepared for us in our room. We also had staff help with our laundry (very nice with 2 young kids). Although the apartments are somewhat dark, it helps keep the unit cool. The unit does have an air conditioner, but we seldom used it. The housekeeping staff kept the room very clean and did the dishes for us as well. All of the staff was very friendly and helpful. I would recommend using the driver from White Sands for your transportation to and from the airport. We used the driver from White Sands exclusively while we were there. Not only was he a safe driver and a valuable resource for information, but he also became a good friend to the kids and I. White Sands is centrally located on the beach, which makes it a perfect base for exploring. I am not sure when our next trip will be (the kids are already asking), but we will definitely stay at White Sands when we return.

reviews.title: rest with the best
reviews.text: My first visit to jamaica was nine years ago and ever since it has been my vacation spot, I have been staying at the WhiteSands for the past four years and it's like going back home, the staff and owners are all warm and welcomes everyone with a hugh hug and a warm smile, the best place to be if you enjoy the beaches, I think it's more than seven miles it just goes on and on. I am always bragging about Negril, it is the most beautiful place I have ever seen. Pine trees, orange trees, mango trees, and bananas tree are all in the garden of White Sands. if you ever stay at WhiteSands ask for Frances and make sure that you say hello to Henry who is always with a smile and ready to guide you to your destination.

reviews.title: This place is amazing!!! :)
reviews.text: I've been coming to this hotel for the last 8 years and loved every minute of it. I love coming here because the staff is friendly,the swimming is great and everyone else that stays here is nice. I have made many friends from my previous visits and still stay in contact with them. This is the best place to stay. I would never stay anywhere except at White Sands hotel.

reviews.title: White Sands
reviews.text: I love White Sands. My mom brings me down from Canada every year. There are no TVs or phones in the rooms, but that doesn't matter. We are on the beach or at the pool all day. Sometimes we stay on the beach side or sometimes we stay on the garden side. Both sides are great. I LOVE THIS PLACE.

reviews.title: We love your place
reviews.text: We have been coming to White Sands Villas in Negril almost every year for 12 years and we love it. It is full of laughter and friendly smiles and the owners are wonderful. The staff are all friendly and respectful. White Sands is right in the middle of the 7-mile beach - restaurants and nightly entertainment on the left and right of the hotel. Ms. Putts' grill has wonderful breakfasts and lunches. You must try it.

reviews.title: review from an Angel
reviews.text: you can not go wrong, I have stayed at White Sands for years and the staff is great. Good location,a pool, beach is great and kept clean. Rooms are nice and the property itself is wonderful. They will take care of you. Just want my room when I go.

reviews.title: The true charm of Negril
reviews.text: A charming and quaint hotel where you feel right at home. A friend recommended white sands last year and we fell in love with it. We went back this year and hoping to go back next year. Great location on the beach, friendly staff, clean rooms and we feel safe. Sun, fun and friends, it doesn't get any better.

reviews.title: Paradise at the White Sands
reviews.text: We have been going to Negril for years and have always stayed at the White Sands. It is in the perfect location and everyone is extremely friendly and willing to go out of their way to make you happy. We even know the taxi drivers stationed outside the facility by name! The maids are fantastic. The rooms are spacious and clean and we feel safe there. They have all become like family. We will always go back! The White Sands in Negril is our escape from reality!

reviews.title: White Sands, Mon, the ONLY place to go!
reviews.text: We love White Sands, would never go anywhere else, we are still relative newbies, only been there twice, but are booked for longer next year! The first year we came as a couple stayed in the garden rooms across the road from the beach with just a fridge but Francis brought us a coffee maker and some dishes and utensils so we could have some of our meals in our room. We loved that room. But this year we brought our three 19, 21, and 23 year old children (they loved it and are looking forward to next year too)and stayed in a suite with a kitchen, that was great too. After they left to head back to school, we stayed in a deluxe room that overlooks the beach, ah heaven. All the rooms are great, the staff, the beach, the people, its a friendly family atmosphere, but very romantic and personal too, if thats what your are looking for! Indulge!! S and B Fraser

reviews.title: Love White Sands - Negril
reviews.text: We love staying here. It has everything you need and is located right on the ocean and within walking distance to almost anything. Has beach, oceanside bar and grill, pool, pool table, ping-pong, darts.

reviews.title: heaven on earth
reviews.text: The owners are the absolute best people and soooo helpful.

description: An intimate resort with a non-hotel atmosphere ideal for families, singles and couples alike. An excellent choice for the undemanding traveler who values the charm of a family owned and managed resort. Excellent mid beach location with rooms on the beach and garden side of the property. Choose from spacious one-bedroom apartments, inviting deluxe and standard rooms, and a villa w/pool.
